code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[title,setTitle]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetchTasks();},[]);const fetchTasks=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/tasks');setTasks(res.data);}catch(e){console.error(e);}};const addTask=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!title.trim())return;const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/tasks',{title});setTasks(prev=>[...prev,res.data]);setTitle('');};const deleteTask=async id=>{await axios.delete("http://localhost:5000/tasks/".concat(id));setTasks(prev=>prev.filter(t=>t.id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Task Manager"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Simple full-stack example by Rajneesh"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:addTask,className:"add-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"New task title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"task-list",children:tasks.map(t=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:t.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteTask(t.id),children:"Delete"})]},t.id))})]});}export default App;
